content: Attempting to use a gsuite email relay that doesn't require the less secure app feature as that is being deprecated in Feb 2021. I did get it to work with the less secure app feature for now. Has anyone used gsuite mail relays successfully without that less secure app enabled?
It's possible we should update our documentation to just say "don't try to use Gmail" rather than having instructions for how to use Gmail if you really want to. (Or maybe they just need an update).
@Tyson Parker did you see the response?

Tim Abbott said:

Tyson Parker did you see the response?

Thank you, I see these replies. I'm not positive but seams that there is a high chance App passwords are going away as well. Shakes fist at google I'll look into implementing yet another mail solution.

I keep getting errors when trying to configure amazon ses as the email provider can someone please help.

@Mia Mathews I think you've put some invalid Python syntax in your settings.py file; maybe a missing close-quote or something like it.
@Tim Abbott I have tried almost everything I can think of. Im running this from a digital ocean droplet. I have not touched any files except to add the email server and the password for it.
@Mia Mathews can you post the email section of the /etc/zulip/settings.py file? Feel free to replace the domains with example.com.
